text: The 1974 African Women's Handball Championship was the first edition of the African Women's Handball Championship, held in Tunisia. It acted as the African qualifying tournament for the 1975 World Women's Handball Championship. ==Standings== ==Results== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 1975 World Championship |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |} ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 1974 Women African Women's Handball Championship African Women's Handball Championship Category:1974 in African handball Category:Women's handball in Tunisia Category:1974 in women's handball
title: 1974 African Women's Handball Championship
